articles.content: Hindustan Unilever share price has declined 7% in last one year and was down almost 1% in intraday trades on Monday. Hindustan Unilever remains amongst few underperformers compared to gains seen by t… [+3070 chars]

articles.title: LIC receives GST notice of Rs 183 crore from Telangana tax authority - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The notice pertains to fiscal year 2017-18, LIC said, adding that it includes a GST demand of Rs 81.2 crore, penalty of Rs 93.2 crore and interest of Rs 8.1 crore
articles.content: The Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) on December 11 said it has received a Goods and Service Tax (GST) notice for Rs 183 crore, which includes pending dues, penalty and interest, from the Te… [+1966 chars]

articles.author: Nigel D'Souza
articles.title: Polycab dethrones Havells as the most valuable wires & cables stock in India: CNBC-TV18 Edge - CNBCTV18
articles.description: With today's surge, Polycab's market capitalisation is nearing the mark of ₹85,000 crore, surpassing Havells, which is at ₹84,200 crore.

articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Petrol, diesel may get cheaper as OMCs become profitable: Report | Mint - Mint
articles.description: In contrast to peak losses of  ₹17 per litre on petrol and  ₹35 per litre on diesel in 2022, OMCs are now making a profit of  ₹8-10 per litre on petrol and  ₹3-4 per litre on diesel.
articles.content: Petrol and diesel prices in the country are expected to come down soon after remaining unchanged for over a year. The government has begun discussing ways to pass on the benefits of softening global … [+2117 chars]

articles.author: Meghna Sen
articles.title: Inox India IPO: Price band fixed at Rs 627-660, issue opens on December 14 - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Inox India has announced the price band for its upcoming IPO at ₹627-660 per equity share. The mainboard IPO will open for subscription on December 14 and close on December 18.
